text.p: These are the leading stories in the Moroccan press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- More than third of foreigners' requests in Spain for residence permits come from Moroccans.
- Gas price expected to rise on world market and this could affect local businesses.

- World Bank report says illiteracy puts Morocco at 119th rank. The report advises the education ministry to take over building schools -- rather than local communities -- to curb corruption and embezzlement.
